feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update dependency @rsuite/icons to ^1.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1643
  • Update dependency @tauri-apps/plugin-os to ~2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1703
  • Update Rust crate open to 5.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1718
  • Update Rust crate sqlx to 0.8.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1720
  • Update dependency next to ^14.2.23 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1722
  • Update dependency react-intl to ^7.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1726
  • Update dependency sanitize-html to ^2.14.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1727
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to ^8.19.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1730
  • Update dependency jsdom to v26 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1735
  • Update Rust crate directories to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1739
  • Update dependency eslint-plugin-react to ^7.37.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1721
  • Update dependency sass to ^1.83.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1728
  • Update Rust crate tokio to 1.43.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1733
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1736
  • Update tauri monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1737
  • Update Rust crate megalodon to v1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1740
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1751
  • Update dependency next to v15 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1625
  • Update tauri monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1741
  • Update dependency react-intl to ^7.1.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1748
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1759
  • Remove unused values by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1761
  • refs #1717 Use ubuntu:22.04 in linux CI and download old webkit2gtk pâ€¦ by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1760
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1747

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.11.0...v1.11.1

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.11.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1763
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1764
  • Update dependency rust to v1.85.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1707
  • Update dependency typescript to ^5.8.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1734
  • Update Rust crate rust-i18n to 3.1.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1757
  • Update Node.js to v22.14.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1723
  • Update dependency eslint to ^9.23.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1738
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to ^8.28.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1744
  • Update dependency eslint-config-prettier to v10 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1745
  • Update Rust crate tauri-plugin-notification to 2.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1742
  • Update dependency @tauri-apps/plugin-notification to ~2.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1743
  • Update Rust crate serde_json to 1.0.140 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1749
  • Update Rust crate tauri-plugin-window-state to 2.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1750
  • Update dependency @types/react to v18.3.20 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1768
  • Update dependency react-intl to ^7.1.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1769
  • Update Rust crate reqwest to >=0.12.15 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1765
  • Update Rust crate once_cell to 1.21.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1756
  • Update dependency @tauri-apps/plugin-clipboard-manager to ^2.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1753
  • Display muted and blocked status on user's profile by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1770
  • Add Interlingua language to crowdin by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1781
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1782
  • Update sponsors by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1784
  • refs #1578 Add languages ko, es-ES, id, pl, and ia by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1785
  • refs #1528 Change navigation item color when opening compose and search by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1786
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1787
  • Migrate eslint config file by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1789
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1788

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.11.1...v1.11.2

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.11.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1790
  • Remove tauri-snap-packager by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1791
  • Fix navigation item color by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1795
  • refs #1792 Add loader in search by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1796
  • refs #1792 Fix search and clear button in search panel by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1797
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1798
  • Update dependency sass to ^1.86.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1746
  • Update Rust crate tauri-plugin-clipboard-manager to 2.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1752
  • Update Rust crate tauri-plugin-http to 2.4.3 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1754
  • Update Rust crate serde to 1.0.219 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1758
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1762
  • Update dependency @tauri-apps/plugin-os to ~2.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1767
  • Update dependency react-virtuoso to v4.12.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1771
  • Update Rust crate scraper to 0.23.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1772
  • Update Rust crate tokio to 1.44.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1773
  • Update dependency @tauri-apps/plugin-http to ~2.4.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1774
  • Update dependency react-icons to ^5.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1776
  • Update dependency sanitize-html to ^2.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1777
  • Update dependency @types/node to ^22.14.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1783
  • refs #1792 Fix default value in search by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1810
  • Update dependency next to ^15.2.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1775
  • Update dependency ts-jest to ^29.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1778
  • Update dependency rsuite to v5.79.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1631
  • Fix validation rule for latest rsuite form validation by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1815

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.11.2...v1.11.3
